message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to consider purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, $12,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  To move this forward, I'd be willing to consider $17,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and consider $14,000. I believe this is a fair price that balances both our interests.
